article:
It has been said that the youngest child is the luckiest.They get all the love and attention of the parents.I am the youngest.  _  I do not feel lucky.I have always lived in a  _  
with my two older sisters.
My earliest memory of this was when we were  _  to
ride our bikes,My dad spent a  _  day
teaching my sisters.It was hard but he  _  .to teach them to ride.Although I could  keep up  easily.I couldn't help secretly  _  .It had taken my dad an entire day to teach my sisters and me,their younger brother,only a few hours!  _   ,the competition between my sisters and me began.It has not been an easy  _  for me,but I continue nonetheless.
Since both my sisters go to famous colleges.I feel  _  to
do well in high school so I can attend as famous a coHege as theirs.It seems that I have always  _  their footsteps.But the reason is Very simple.I want their  _  .I am just as good as they are.
As I follow their footsteps.I have  _  my own path in the process because we
are not the same person and we have  _  interests.They've won many awards in marketing while I perform well in sports.Being the  _  has given me a path to see,but not necessarily follow.
I don't know when this competition that I  _  between
my sister and me shall end.but it is one  _  that encourages me to succeed.I do not want to be the  _  that nobody acknowledges.I shall always  _  to be as good as my sisters,if not better,and in the process   _  my
own person.
